players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I am very sorry to hear about Diana. We need to be careful and watch everyone closely. Does anyone have any suspicions or information to share?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We should vote him out to protect the town."
Bob: "Charlie, your accusation is very bold but also very suspicious. Why would you reveal your investigation result so quickly and openly? Are you sure you aren't trying to mislead us?"
Bob: "Charlie, your quick accusation without proof seems like a desperate move to cover up something. Maybe you’re the one trying to manipulate the town’s trust."
You: "Charlie’s claim seems important since only a detective would have that info, but Bob’s skepticism is understandable. Let’s not rush. We should ask Charlie for more details before voting."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. His attempts to accuse me are typical mafia deflection. We must vote him out now to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
